pageTitle: Matthew Williamson Nomadic Stripe Shift Dress | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements UK sizes. Sizes listed are Size & Fit Length: 33in / 84cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS Made in the UK. Dry clean. 97% cotton/3% elastane. Fabric: Mid-weight jersey. A bright, vivid print gives this Matthew Williamson sheath dress a hit of chic energy. The clean-lined silhouette is detailed with pleats along the crew neckline, and the long sleeves are finished with hidden zips at the cuffs. Hidden back zip. Unlined. Size & Fit tab. textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Central St. Martins graduate Matthew Williamson launched his luxury fashion house in 1997. That fall, Williamson showed his star-studded debut collection, 'Electric Angels' during London Fashion Week. With Matthew Williamson sunglasses and a full ready-to-wear line, the aesthetic mainstays of exotic colors and baroque embellishments distinguish the brand to this day. Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free.
